review: 垃圾暴雪，答辩中的答辩，我觉得你能做的再答辩点。
好暴雪你这样子玩是吧
Tengo este juego prácticamente desde que salio en 2016, y solo puedo decir que es un juegazo. Recomendado

https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/

Play this instead and have some fun be happy
i love overwatch porn
CREÍ QUE ERA PORNO!!!
Todo es Culpa de Ramattra ! >:(
hhhhh
暴雪我们要国服！！！！！！！！！干点人事
Downloaded the game just to leave a negative review for this lazy cash grab.
答辩，后面加个2就成新游戏了是吧，终究不是国服，还不如上架炉石传说
暴雪老子操你的妈
诸位将军，你们也不希望三国杀好评如潮吧？
说一下，4年的时间，1000小时，很感谢守望里认识的朋友。但也很遗憾，狗N养的暴雪，看不起中国人还几把想再回来捞钱，我下了一早上就为了骂他一句WCNM，兄弟们，有缘CSGO 详见
游戏很好玩，但我国服号没了，差评！！！！
现在国服FF14的纷争前线尘封密岩闸还没开，打个差评

As a kid being a big fan of Team Fortress Two fan I was first on the hate Overwatch band wagon. 
Until I gave the game a chance during its content drought due to the promised future of "Overwatch 2".
Staying around for two seasons of Overwatch but with a 2 slapped on having fun with friends who didn't buy the 1st but the game started to get tiring with contents that was once free being in the new Overwatch shop, old Overwatch 1 items now priced at 10 to 20 bucks for one skin. New players get a sliver of the heroes and new heroes are locked behind a battle pass paywall. The removal of the loot boxes a scummy practice yet was the most fair to the consumer deleted and the free currency given for playing the game now dripped fed you. Promised content not given to the consumers, paywall after paywall. In the end you die as a hero or you live to become the villain and blizzard already chose the latter. This game once was game of the year, now it is a shadow of what it once was. Do not spend money on this game, spend it on some other game or hobbies that try to value your time.

TLDR Overwatch "2" is a shell of what it once was and now is a scummy live service shell of what it once was.

mercy

A娇蛮任性，显得我沉沦是理所应当。我不在意她闹脾气时对我甩脸色，我甚至愿意容忍她朝我扔花瓶——老天，她有够狂野。不过她勾勾手指我就会回到她身边，必要时我会从此刻的凌晨开始为她采四百万朵玫瑰去恳求她的原谅。她像是那种情场高手游走于不同的人身边，嘲弄自己不过是个备选项，可她总是能将玩家的心牢牢紧握。我也不例外，为她的笑容一掷千金。所谓的入场费也是你的小把戏之一吧？调侃的话还没说出口，A的眼波流转就把我俘获，却又在情到深处时羞涩地向我承认她也想成为首选。
于是我们开始一起消磨时间，即使我并不擅长这档事。A是那种会不断向你索求的类型，对此我向外宣传是我自己乐此不疲，毕竟美人在怀，我又没有扬名立万的远大抱负，我猜她最终能够成为我新的港湾。
是啊，前提是能完全抹去O不求回报的付出在我心中烙下的印迹的话。
在A宣布她要为了我摆脱过去，换一个新身份来和我共度余生的那一天，我在楼下遇到了过去一年消失得无影无踪的O，她的经过唤醒曾经我们一起经历的点点滴滴，勾起我年少懵懂时候的美好回忆，她是她又不是她，她似乎变换了样貌，连性取向都有些变了，她说她学会了很多新的花招，她的手紧紧的握住我，就像是用上了生命的力量，在这种生命之握下，我无法控制我的身体，我鬼使神差地跟着她回了家。
我的手指摩挲着怀中人的薄唇，都说薄唇的人最是薄情，O现在却在我跟前，用熟悉的气息引诱我靠近。我微微偏头去抢占她的呼吸，她表现出一如既往的毫无攻击性。而交换完一吻之后我好像也没真正地进入她的眼里，只是将手臂搭在我的肩上。我顺着她的视线朝镜子里望去，她的双指夹着我的钱夹，我糟糕的、凌乱的衣衫，搭配着宣告不忠的口红印。
“我们什么关系？开UU加速器呗，稳定掉线不连接，你和她的相处模式，自己都不熟悉了吗？”
“少揶揄我。”
在这件事上偏偏曾经的O最有资格。

当我带着一身证据回到A身边时，她没有发怒，甚至没有阴阳怪气，只是淡淡地说，我看到O了。
地上她撕碎新身份证明歪歪扭扭地拼凑出复活二字，实际上复活的却是守望先锋归来。

彼阳若至，初升东曦。

怎么有人好评的？

What a fucking embarrassment. How do you fumble what was once so polished, unique, fun, creative, I mean it was an industry standout for christ sakes. I used to shit on Jeff Kaplan as a funny scapegoat kind of figure, but I always felt that he had passion for the franchise. Whatever leech that was once on the underbelly of this game has now completely consumed it. For all the interest and effort that was put in, all that’s left to show for it is an entropic vapid phylactery for a game industry so aesthetically incentivised that it isn’t even worth experiencing as a “free” title. But it isn’t free. It cost THE ENTIRE EXISTENCE of Overwatch 1, which had no significant predatory micro-transactional dogshit and had arguably more content because they cut half the maps/gamemodes. It cost the talent and passion of the original team. And it cost me my fucking time. How people still continue to defend the practices of not just the Overwatch Team, but of BlizzardActivision (what a joke btw), when games like Battlefront 2 and No Man’s Sky were RAZED online for similar shit, blows my mind. Overwatch was so initially impressive and praised, its legacy was in constant comparison to TEAM FORTRESS 2. And in a universe where the most recent TF2 update was so desperately fantasized about that the community convinced a company so infamously dormant as VALVE to add simple bug patches and now has a larger active player base than ever before because of it, knowing Overwatch fails to capture an audience on it’s own fucking launcher and has to scramble to spread like the infection it has become to its competitor has to make you wonder how many hands could drop such large a ball. If you purchased anything in game with real money, battle-pass or otherwise, I feel genuinely sorry for you. I understand that I may be coming off as irrationally upset, but I really think that so much opportunity has been intentionally warped to become as selfishly utilized by some fat cat’s pocket as possible. If you still care about this game’s future development, you are being manipulated and gaslit by a suit with a cartoon tongue lolling out of its mouth as it fantasizes about stealing more of your money. For those who are concerned with my lack of critique of the actual gameplay, understand that in the world of bread and circuses, if the bread is stale and maggoty, and the circuses are sad, you look past the tents towards the bigger picture. Maybe once upon a time I would have had the energy to speak in depth about it, but now I can only picture myself a spineless homunculus blindly stumbling around a padded cell whenever I try to think of how to put it. Put plainly, to experience Overwatch 2’s gameplay nowadays is to experience tickling the inside of your urethra with a serrated pike.



TLDR: This shit is mad butt doodoo. I’m plat in ranked so I would know!!!!. Play League of Legends or Warframe instead.

I've played Overwatch since 2016, first Halloween event. This game turned to greedy garbage.

我打游戏向来是急着通关，体会不到那种上百上千小时大佬对游戏的评测，终于能有机会让我说几句了。
最开始是我哥来我家给正在打枪神纪的我推荐了这款游戏，并且让我玩了他的号。当时网速还挺慢的，下载游戏的同时我在官网上看着一个又一个英雄的技能介绍。给我印象最深的是死神，我当时觉得这英雄太帅了。就这样玩我哥的号玩了几年，我终于买了自己的号。在买号前，我在学校脑子中一遍一遍过着各个英雄的技能，不知怎么回事突然就觉得天使的技能挺好玩的。于是之前一直散打的位置，在我买了号之后主玩奶位了。我印象最深的不是某场比赛某场游戏，而是一次自定义听歌房。那时候还没有地图工坊，地图是多拉多，我们卡bug到地图最上方那个塔上，我玩着天使，放着当时很火的skin，就这样一次次地从地图最上方的塔像cg里的天使一样从空中滑翔下去。不知道为什么当时的电脑只能支持最低画质，什么都看不清，但依然能玩得很有使命感。好了，之后的烂活大家也知道了，守望1没人玩，守望2归来，以及关闭国服，无底线的恶心中国玩家。这是款好游戏，但是只是曾经。现在我只希望它早点凉透
